activeAccount.title: Active your Account
activeAccount.description: We are woking hard to make L2E ready for everybody and we are building up our community eco-system carefully and responsibly, thus activation code is required to enter this game.

wallet.newWallet: Don’t rist losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your Seed Pharase in a place you trust. It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
wallet.exportWallet: Please choose Seed Phrase in order and make sure your Seed Phrase was correct written. Once forgotten, it cannot be recovered.

exportWallteWarn.title: Wrong!
exportWallteWarn.content: Seed Phrase order isn't correct, please try again after check your seed phrase.
